name: Abandoned Logging Camp
description: An abandoned logging camp located at the end of Sunset Boulevard, bordering a dense and ominous forest. The site is rusted, unused, and clearly never fully operational, suggesting it served purposes beyond legitimate logging.

snapshot.name: Abandoned Logging Camp
snapshot.location: End of Sunset Boulevard, at the edge of a dense forest
snapshot.description: The logging camp is completely deserted. Most machinery is heavily rusted, and several machines appear never to have been truly used. A small work shed contains a fireplace with burned ashes. Within the ashes, investigators can faintly make out a piece of paper bearing a strange symbol identical to one found in Padrich’s blueprints. A narrow, overgrown road leads from the camp into the forest, which is thick, dark, and extremely easy to become lost in.

clues.clueText: A partially burned piece of paper bearing a symbol associated with a dark fertility deity, matching a symbol found in Padrich’s blueprints.
clues.location: Fireplace ashes inside the work shed
clues.discoveryMethod: Visual inspection; Cthulhu Mythos skill to identify
reveals: The involvement of a cult worshipping a dark god associated with harvest and fertility
A connection between the logging camp and Padrich’s research or plans

conditions.description: The surrounding forest is extremely dense and dark; entering it recklessly risks becoming hopelessly lost.
conditions.mechanicalEffect: Navigation or survival rolls may be required; failure may result in investigators becoming lost

exits.description: The road back toward Cassandra town and the cemetery
A narrow, abandoned path leading into the forest

snapshot.keeperNotes: The logging camp was never a normal industrial site; it likely served as a front or staging area for cult-related activities. The forest beyond the camp should feel threatening and overwhelming, discouraging casual exploration.

connections.description: Investigators pass the cemetery on the way to the logging camp, and clues there may foreshadow what is found here
A hidden path from the logging camp leads deeper into the forest where a transformed abomination lurks
